name.description: Name of bot, e.g. Killer Bee

authors.description: Name of authors, e.g. John Doe (john_doe@somewhere.net)

description.description: Short description of the bot, preferable a one-liner

homepage.description: URL to a home page for the bot

countryCodes.description: 2-letter country code(s) defined by ISO 3166-1, e.g. "UK"

gameTypes.description: Game types supported by this bot, e.g. "classic", "melee" and/or "1v1"

platform.description: Platform used for running the bot, e.g. JVM 17 or .NET 5

programmingLang.description: Language used for programming the bot, e.g. Java 17 or C# 10

initialPosition.description: Initial start position of the bot used for debugging.

secret.description: Secret used for access control with the server

bootId.description: Unique boot id, which is only available if the boot was booted up locally
